title: Royal Óbidos Spa & Golf Resort awarded IAGTO European Golf Resort of the Year 2016Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Royal Óbidos Spa & Golf Resort awarded IAGTO European Golf Resort of the Year 2016  
Royal Óbidos Spa & Golf Resort, Óbidos, Portugal has been awarded the prestigious title of 2016 European Golf Resort of the Year at the IAGTO Awards ceremony held in Tenerife on October 8th, 2015.
 
The award of European Golf Resort of the Year is voted for by almost 600 specialist golf travel Tour Operators, who are members of the International Association of Golf Tour Operators, based in more than 60 countries worldwide.
 
Royal Óbidos Spa & Golf Resort is located on Portugal’s west coast, a mere 45 minutes from Portugal’s capital city of Lisbon, situated in a privileged location nestling between the Atlantic Ocean and Óbidos Lagoon offering truly stunning views throughout.
 
The Resort comprises of the Evolutee Hotel, a boutique hotel of 39 rooms with interior décor by the über trendy design team of Yoo Studio, the design team at the international design and lifestyle company, yoo, founded by John Hitchcox and acclaimed designer Philippe Starck, a conference centre with capacity of up to 315 delegates, the famous Kobe Steak & Sushi Restaurant and the Elemental Spa, which has the exclusivity of Eminence Organics products for Portugal and offers guests an invigorating yet tranquil experience, with a vast menu of signature treatments and rituals using, also, regionally sourced organic products.
 
In addition the resort’s 18 hole championship golf course, the very last design of the late golfing legend Severiano Ballesteros, features in Europe’s Top 100 (recently ranked 57th at the Golf Word magazine “Top 100 courses in Continental Europe 2016”).
 
The resort’s luxurious real estate component – plots for villas, apartments and hotel residences linked to the hotel are currently for sale – is also worth to mention, after being awarded the “Best Touristic Project Prize” at SIL 2014 awards, materializing just four years since the opening of the Resort in January 2012 which, furthermore, signifies the high quality of the product and excellence of service offered to Resort guests.
 
“A truly honourable and prestigious award”
Upon collecting the award, Golf Director, Eduardo Johnston da Silva announced “This is a truly honourable and prestigious award that we are absolutely thrilled to receive. It recognizes the tremendous input and dedication of the brilliant young team at Royal Óbidos Spa & Golf Resort whom consistently strive to deliver the very best product and excellence of service to each and every guest we host. The IAGTO European Golf Resort of the Year award is voted by IAGTO Tour Operators from across the globe, and since our opening in 2012 we have received truly phenomenal support and pro-active promotion from a huge number of tour operators throughout the world. It is important to express the sincere gratitude to each and every Tour Operator that has helped develop this project into the success it has become”.
 
Source:- IAGTO
